meanings.definition: The act of dividing something into two equal parts.
meanings.sent1: She learned about bisections in math class.
meanings.sent2: The bisections of the cake were perfectly equal.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved bisections of a rope.
meanings.sent4: The bisections of the road led to two different destinations.
meanings.sent5: The bisections of the mirror created a symmetrical reflection.

meanings.definition: A line or plane that divides something into two equal parts.
meanings.sent1: The bisections on the map showed the border clearly.
meanings.sent2: The bisections of the rectangle split it into two congruent parts.
meanings.sent3: The chef used bisections to cut the sandwich into halves.
meanings.sent4: The bisections of the field separated the two properties.
meanings.sent5: The bisections of the flagpole divided the flag into two equal sections.
